messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Shattered Glass Enigma DATE: 03/03/51 The courtroom was filled with an air of suspense as the trial unfolded. The prosecution summoned the officers pivotal to the investigation to the stand. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and your role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Johnson, the lead investigator in this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Johnson. Can you recount the events surrounding the discovery of the shattered glass at the museum? WITNESS: Yes, on the night of December 12th, Officer C. D. Kelly reported a break-in at the museum with several exhibits vandalized. We commenced an investigation immediately. PROSECUTOR: Who was in charge of analyzing the forensic evidence? WITNESS: Criminalist E. F. Lewis and Technician G. H. Mitchell were assigned to the forensic examination. PROSECUTOR: Who conducted the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Nelson and K. L. Oliver were responsible for interrogating the suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense initiated a cross-examination of Captain Johnson regarding the investigative protocols followed. In the course of the trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Peterson, O. P. Quinn, and Q. R. Robinson were also called to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
